abstract: World Food Program, United Nations's main anti-hunger humanitarian agency, announces Ukraine is sole recipient of benefits in Europe; report that two-year conflict in eastern Ukraine has left in 1.5 million hungry and 300,000 in need of immediate help.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Ukraine: Conflict Brings Hunger Crisis

snippet: The two-year-old conflict in eastern Ukraine has left about 1.5 million people hungry, including nearly 300,000 in need of immediate help, the World Food Program said.
lead_paragraph: The two-year-old conflict in eastern Ukraine has left about 1.5 million people hungry, including nearly 300,000 in need of immediate help, the World Food Program said.
